scripts.yaml: jq '.[]|select(.chainName=="${NETWORK:-mumbai}")' config/networks.json | npx hbs-cli -i subgraph.yaml_handlebar -e yaml -o thegraph
scripts.build2: pnpm run yaml && pnpm run codegen && pnpm run graph-build
scripts.predeploy: pnpm run clean && pnpm run yaml && pnpm run codegen && pnpm run build && pnpm run check
scripts.deploy: pnpm run predeploy && cd thegraph && graph deploy zapaz/eip721-${NETWORK:-mumbai} --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $THEGRAPH_KEY
